shortDescription: System command injection in fromNtp in TOTOLINK A3002RU version 1.0.8 allows attackers to execute system commands via the "ntpServerIp2" POST parameter. Certain payloads cause the device to become permanently inoperable.
vulnerabilityName: totolink a3002ru_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
